description: Templates a file out to a remote server.

src.description: Path of a Jinja2 formatted template on the local server. This can be a relative or absolute path.

force.description: the default is C(yes), which will replace the remote file when contents are different than the source.  If C(no), the file will only be transferred if the destination does not exist.

trim_blocks.description: If this is set to True the first newline after a block is removed (block, not variable tag!).

dest.description: Location to render the template to on the remote machine.

block_end_string.description: The string marking the end of a block.

variable_start_string.description: The string marking the beginning of a print statement.

newline_sequence.description: Specify the newline sequence to use for templating files.

variable_end_string.description: The string marking the end of a print statement.

block_start_string.description: The string marking the beginning of a block.
